pdf_parser.cpp
1 /****************************************************************************
2 **
3 ** DocToText - Converts DOC, XLS, XLSB, PPT, RTF, ODF (ODT, ODS, ODP),
4 ** OOXML (DOCX, XLSX, PPTX), iWork (PAGES, NUMBERS, KEYNOTE),
5 ** ODFXML (FODP, FODS, FODT), PDF, EML and HTML documents to plain text.
6 ** Extracts metadata and annotations.
7 **
8 ** Copyright (c) 2006-2013, SILVERCODERS(R)
9 ** http://silvercoders.com
10 **
11 ** Project homepage: http://silvercoders.com/en/products/doctotext
12 **
13 ** This program may be distributed and/or modified under the terms of the
14 ** GNU General Public License version 2 as published by the Free Software
15 ** Foundation and appearing in the file COPYING.GPL included in the
16 ** packaging of this file.
17 **
18 ** Please remember that any attempt to workaround the GNU General Public
19 ** License using wrappers, pipes, client/server protocols, and so on
20 ** is considered as license violation. If your program, published on license
21 ** other than GNU General Public License version 2, calls some part of this
22 ** code directly or indirectly, you have to buy commercial license.
23 ** If you do not like our point of view, simply do not use the product.
24 **
25 ** Licensees holding valid commercial license for this product
26 ** may use this file in accordance with the license published by
27 ** SILVERCODERS and appearing in the file COPYING.COM
28 **

31 ** MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
32 **

52 //some functions specific for this parser
53 
54 //converts hex char (2 bytes) to single char. Examples:
55 //0x41 will be converted to single 'A'
56 //0x30 will be converted to '0'
57 static unsigned char hex_char_to_single_char(const char* hex_char)
58 {
59  //first four bits
60  unsigned char res = 0;
61  if (hex_char[0] >= 'A')
62  res = (hex_char[0] - 'A' + 10) << 4;
63  else
64  res = (hex_char[0] - '0') << 4;
65  if (hex_char[1] >= 'A')
66  return res | (hex_char[1] - 'A' + 10);
67  return res | (hex_char[1] - '0');
68 }
69 
70 //just like above, but in reverse order
71 static std::string char_to_hex_char(const char ch)
72 {
73  char res[2];
74  res[0] = ((ch & 0xF0) >> 4);
75  if (res[0] < 10)
76  res[0] += '0';
77  else
78  res[0] += ('A' - 10);
79  res[1] = ch & 0x0F;
80  if (res[1] < 10)
81  res[1] += '0';
82  else
83  res[1] += ('A' - 10);
84  return std::string(res, 2);
85 }
86 
87 static bool hex_char_is_valid(const char hex_char)
88 {
89  return (hex_char >= '0' && hex_char <= '9') || (hex_char >= 'A' && hex_char <= 'F');
90 }
91 
92 static void normalize_hex_char(char& ch)
93 {
94  if (ch >= 'a' && ch <= 'f')
95  ch -= ('a' - 'A');
96 }
97 
98 static std::string unicode_codepoint_to_utf8(unsigned int codepoint)
99 {
100  char out[4];
101  if (codepoint < 0x80)
102  {
103  out[0] = (char)codepoint;
104  return std::string(out, 1);
105  }
106  else if (codepoint < 0x800)
107  {
108  out[0] = 0xC0 | (codepoint >> 6);
109  out[1] = 0x80 | (codepoint & 0x0000003F);
110  return std::string(out, 2);
111  }
112  else if (codepoint < 0x10000)
113  {
114  out[0] = 0xE0 | (codepoint >> 12);
115  out[1] = 0x80 | ((codepoint & 0x00000FFF) >> 6);
116  out[2] = 0x80 | (codepoint & 0x0000003F);
117  return std::string(out, 3);
118  }
119  else
120  {
121  out[0] = 0xF0 | (codepoint >> 18);
122  out[1] = 0x80 | ((codepoint & 0x0003FFFF) >> 12);
123  out[2] = 0x80 | ((codepoint & 0x00000FFF) >> 6);
124  out[3] = 0x80 | (codepoint & 0x0000003F);
125  return std::string(out, 4);
126  }
127  return "";
128 }
129 
130 static std::string utf8_codepoint_to_utf8(unsigned int utf8_codepoint)
131 {
132  char out[4];
133  if (utf8_codepoint < 0x100)
134  {
135  out[0] = utf8_codepoint;
136  return std::string(out, 1);
137  }
138  else if (utf8_codepoint < 0x10000)
139  {
140  out[0] = utf8_codepoint >> 8;
141  out[1] = (utf8_codepoint & 0x000000FF);
142  return std::string(out, 2);
143  }
144  else if (utf8_codepoint < 0x1000000)
145  {
146  out[0] = utf8_codepoint >> 16;
147  out[1] = (utf8_codepoint & 0x0000FF00) >> 8;
148  out[2] = (utf8_codepoint & 0x000000FF);
149  return std::string(out, 3);
150  }
151  else
152  {
153  out[0] = utf8_codepoint >> 24;
154  out[1] = (utf8_codepoint & 0x00FF0000) >> 16;
155  out[2] = (utf8_codepoint & 0x0000FF00) >> 8;
156  out[3] = (utf8_codepoint & 0x000000FF);
157  return std::string(out, 4);
158  }
159  return "";
160 }
161 
162 static void uint_to_hex_string(unsigned int value, std::string& output)
163 {
164  char buffer[20];
165  sprintf(buffer, "%x", value);
166  for (int i = 0; i < 20 && buffer[i] != 0; ++i)
167  {
168  if (buffer[i] >= 'a')
169  buffer[i] = buffer[i] - ('a' - 'A');
170  }
171  if (strlen(buffer) % 2 == 1)
172  output += '0';
173  output += buffer;
174 }
175 
176 static unsigned int hex_string_to_uint(const char* hex_number, size_t size)
177 {
178  unsigned int val = 0;
179  for (int i = 0; i < size; ++i)
180  {
181  val = val << 4;
182  if (hex_number[i] <= '9')
183  val = val | (hex_number[i] - '0');
184  else
185  val = val | (hex_number[i] - 'A' + 10);
186  }
187  return val;
188 }
189 
190 static std::string utf16be_to_utf8(std::string& utf16be)
191 {
192  unsigned int utf16 = 0;
193  if (utf16be.length() % 4 != 0)
194  {
195  for (int i = 0; i < 4 - utf16be.length() % 4; ++i)
196  utf16be += '0';
197  }
198  std::string ret;
199  for (unsigned int index = 0; index < utf16be.length(); index += 4)
200  {
201  if (utf16be[index] == 'D' && utf16be[index + 1] == '8' && index + 8 <= utf16be.length())
202  {
203  utf16 = hex_string_to_uint(&utf16be[index], 8);
204  index += 4;
205  }
206  else
207  utf16 = hex_string_to_uint(&utf16be[index], 4);
208  ret += unichar_to_utf8(utf16);
209  }
210  return ret;
211 }
212 
213 //increments "hex string". Example:
214 //0FCB will be converted to 0FCC
215 static void increment_hex_string(std::string& hex_string)
216 {
217  if (hex_string.length() == 0)
218  hex_string = "01";
219  else
220  {
221  int index = hex_string.length() - 1;
222  while (true)
223  {
224  if (hex_string[index] < '9' || hex_string[index] < 'F')
225  {
226  ++hex_string[index];
227  return;
228  }
229  if (hex_string[index] == '9')
230  {
231  hex_string[index] = 'A';
232  return;
233  }
234  if (hex_string[index] == 'F')
235  {
236  hex_string[index] = '0';
237  --index;
238  }
239  if (index < 0)
240  {
241  hex_string = "0001" + hex_string;
242  return;
243  }
244  }
245  }
246 }
247 
248 void parsePDFDate(tm& date, const std::string& str_date)
249 {
250  if (str_date.length() < 14)
251  return;
252  std::string year = str_date.substr(0, 4);
253  date.tm_year = strtol(year.c_str(), NULL, 10);
254  std::string month = str_date.substr(4, 2);
255  date.tm_mon = strtol(month.c_str(), NULL, 10);
256  std::string day = str_date.substr(6, 2);
257  date.tm_mday = strtol(day.c_str(), NULL, 10);
258  std::string hour = str_date.substr(8, 2);
259  date.tm_hour = strtol(hour.c_str(), NULL, 10);
260  std::string minute = str_date.substr(10, 2);
261  date.tm_min = strtol(minute.c_str(), NULL, 10);
262  std::string second = str_date.substr(12, 2);
263  date.tm_sec = strtol(second.c_str(), NULL, 10);
264  date.tm_year -= 1900;
265  --date.tm_mon;
266 }
267 
268 bool last_is_new_line(const std::string& str)
269 {
270  return str.length() > 0 && str[str.length() - 1] == '\n';
271 }
272

382 const static unsigned int MacExpertEncodingUtf8[256] =
383 {

393  0xc2bd, 0xc2be, 0xe2859b, 0xe2859c, 0xe2859d, 0xe2859e, 0xe28593, 0xe28594,

525 
526 struct PDFParser::Implementation
527 {
528  class PredefinedSimpleEncodings : public std::map<std::string, unsigned int*>
529  {
530  public:
531  PredefinedSimpleEncodings()
532  {
533  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int*>("MacRomanEncoding", (unsigned int*)MacRomanEncodingUtf8));
534  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int*>("WinAnsiEncoding", (unsigned int*)WinAnsiEncodingUtf8));
535  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int*>("MacExpertEncoding", (unsigned int*)MacExpertEncodingUtf8));
536  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int*>("StandardEncoding", (unsigned int*)StandardEncodingUtf8));
537  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int*>("SymbolEncoding",(unsigned int*)SymbolEncodingUtf8));
538  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int*>("ZapfDingbatsEncoding", (unsigned int*)ZapfDingbatsEncodingUtf8));
539  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int*>("PdfDocEncoding", (unsigned int*)PdfDocEncodingUtf8));
540  }
541  };
542 
543  static PredefinedSimpleEncodings m_pdf_predefined_simple_encodings;
544 
545  class CIDToUnicode : public std::map<std::string, std::string>
546  {
547  public:
548  CIDToUnicode()
549  {
550  insert(std::pair<std::string, std::string>("GB-EUC-H", "Adobe-GB1-UCS2"));
551  insert(std::pair<std::string, std::string>("GB-EUC-V", "Adobe-GB1-UCS2"));
552  insert(std::pair<std::string, std::string>("GBpc-EUC-H", "Adobe-GB1-UCS2"));
553  insert(std::pair<std::string, std::string>("GBpc-EUC-V", "Adobe-GB1-UCS2"));
554  insert(std::pair<std::string, std::string>("GBK-EUC-H", "Adobe-GB1-UCS2"));
555  insert(std::pair<std::string, std::string>("GBK-EUC-V", "Adobe-GB1-UCS2"));
556  insert(std::pair<std::string, std::string>("GBK2K-H", "Adobe-GB1-UCS2"));
557  insert(std::pair<std::string, std::string>("GBK2K-V", "Adobe-GB1-UCS2"));
558  insert(std::pair<std::string, std::string>("UniGB-UCS2-H", "Adobe-GB1-UCS2"));
559  insert(std::pair<std::string, std::string>("UniGB-UCS2-V", "Adobe-GB1-UCS2"));
560  insert(std::pair<std::string, std::string>("UniGB-UTF16-H", "Adobe-GB1-UCS2"));
561  insert(std::pair<std::string, std::string>("UniGB-UTF16-V", "Adobe-GB1-UCS2"));
562  insert(std::pair<std::string, std::string>("B5pc-H", "Adobe-CNS1-UCS2"));
563  insert(std::pair<std::string, std::string>("B5pc-V", "Adobe-CNS1-UCS2"));

575  insert(std::pair<std::string, std::string>("UniCNS-UTF16-V", "Adobe-CNS1-UCS2"));

608  };
609 
610  static CIDToUnicode m_pdf_cid_to_unicode;
611 
612  class CharacterNames : public std::map<std::string, unsigned int>
613  {
614  public:
615  CharacterNames()
616  {
617  #warning TODO: List is incomplete. Can we find something better? Full list in PDFMiner counts about... 2000 names
618  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>(".notdef", 0x0));
619  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("A", 0x41));
620  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("AE", 0xC386));
621  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("Aacute", 0xC381));
622  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("Acircumflex", 0xC382));
623  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("Adieresis", 0xC384));
624  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("Agrave", 0xC380));
625  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("Aring", 0xC385));
626  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("Aogonek", 0xC484));

628  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("B", 0x42));
629  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("C", 0x43));
630  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("Cacute", 0xC486));

632  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("D", 0x44));
633  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("E", 0x45));

836  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("thorn", 0xC39E));

838  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("threequarters", 0xC2BE));
839  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("threesuperior", 0xC2B3));

846  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("ucircumflex", 0xC3BB));

848  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("ugrave", 0xC3B9));
849  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("underscore", 0x5F));
850  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("v", 0x76));
851  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("w", 0x77));
852  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("x", 0x78));
853  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("y", 0x79));
854  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("yacute", 0xC3BD));
855  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("ydieresis", 0xC3BF));
856  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("yen", 0xC2A5));
857  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("z", 0x7A));
858  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("zacute", 0xC5BA));
859  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("zcaron", 0xC5BE));
860  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("zdot", 0xC5BC)); //not sure about this
861  insert(std::pair<std::string, unsigned int>("zero", 0x30));
862  }
863  };
864 
865  static CharacterNames m_pdf_character_names;
866 
867  class PDFReader
868  {
869  public:
870  enum PDFObjectTypes
871  {
872  dictionary,
873  boolean,
874  int_numeric,
875  float_numeric,
876  array,
877  string,
878  name,
879  stream,
880  null,
881  //indirect object has structure:
882  //A B obj
883  //[object data of any kind (can be array, number, dictionary etc.)]
884  //endobj
885  //
886  //where A is an index of this object, B is generation number
887  indirect_object,
888  //reference is a combination of two numbers and 'R' character like:
889  //A B R.
890  //A is an index of the object, B is generation number
891  reference_call,
892  operator_obj,
893  unknown_obj
894  };
895 
896  enum CompressionTypes
897  {
898  ascii_hex,
899  lzw,
900  rle,
901  ascii_85,
902  flat,
903  unknown_compression
904  };
905 
906  enum OperatorTypes
907  {
908  Tj, //直接类型内容的标识
909  TJ, //cid内容标识
910  Td, //Td 和 Tm 决定是否换行
911  TD,
912  T_star,
913  Tm, //Td 和 Tm 决定是否换行
914  double_quote,
915  quote,
916  TL,
917  BT, //文本块开始标识
918  ET, //文本块结束标识
919  Tf, //字体名称标识
920  TZ,
921  cm,
922  q,
923  Q,
924  Tc,
925  Tw,
926  Ts,
927  #warning TODO: Add support for operator "Do".
928  Do, //存储在 resource 中的 cid 内容标识
929  usecmap,
930  begincidrange,
931  endcidrange,
932  begincidchar,
933  endcidchar,
934  beginnotdefrange,
935  endnotdefrange,
936  beginnotdefchar,
937  endnotdefchar,
938  beginbfrange,
939  endbfrange,
940  beginbfchar,
941  endbfchar,
942  unknown_operator
943  };
944 
945  private:
946  class CompressionCodes : public std::map<std::string, CompressionTypes>
947  {
948  public:
949  CompressionCodes()
950  {
951  insert(std::pair<std::string, CompressionTypes>("ASCIIHexDecode", ascii_hex));
952  insert(std::pair<std::string, CompressionTypes>("LZWDecode", lzw));
953  insert(std::pair<std::string, CompressionTypes>("RunLengthDecode", rle));
954  insert(std::pair<std::string, CompressionTypes>("ASCII85Decode", ascii_85));
955  insert(std::pair<std::string, CompressionTypes>("FlateDecode", flat));
956  }
957  };
958 
959  class OperatorCodes : public std::map<std::string, OperatorTypes>
960  {
961  public:
962  OperatorCodes()
963  {
964  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("Tj", Tj));
965  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("TJ", TJ));
966  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("Td", Td));
967  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("TD", TD));
968  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("T*", T_star));
969  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("Tm", Tm));
970  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("\"", double_quote));
971  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("\'", quote));
972  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("TL", TL));
973  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("BT", BT));
974  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("ET", ET));
975  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("Tf", Tf));
976  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("Do", Do));
977  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("TZ", TZ));
978  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("cm", cm));
979  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("q", q));
980  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("Q", Q));
981  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("Ts", Ts));
982  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("Tw", Tw));
983  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("Tc", Tc));
984  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("usecmap", usecmap));
985  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("begincidrange", begincidrange));
986  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("endcidrange", endcidrange));
987  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("begincidchar", begincidchar));
988  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("endcidchar", endcidchar));
989  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("beginnotdefrange", beginnotdefrange));
990  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("endnotdefrange", endnotdefrange));
991  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("beginnotdefchar", beginnotdefchar));
992  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("endnotdefchar", endnotdefchar));
993  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("beginbfrange", beginbfrange));
994  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("endbfrange", endbfrange));
995  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("beginbfchar", beginbfchar));
996  insert(std::pair<std::string, OperatorTypes>("endbfchar", endbfchar));
997  }
998  };
999 
1000  static CompressionCodes m_compression_codes;
1001  static OperatorCodes m_operator_codes;
1002 
1003  public:
1004  static CompressionTypes getCompressionCode(const std::string& compression_name)
1005  {
1006  CompressionCodes::const_iterator it = m_compression_codes.find(compression_name);
1007  if (it == m_compression_codes.end())
1008  return unknown_compression;
1009  return it->second;
1010  }
1011 
1012  static OperatorTypes getOperatorCode(const std::string& operator_name)
1013  {
1014  OperatorCodes::const_iterator it = m_operator_codes.find(operator_name);
1015  if (it == m_operator_codes.end())
1016  return unknown_operator;
1017  return it->second;
1018  }
1019 
1020  public:
1021  class ReferenceInfo;
1022  class PDFObject;
1023  class PDFDictionary;
1024  class PDFBoolean;
1025  class PDFNumericInteger;
1026  class PDFNumericFloat;
1027  class PDFArray;
1028  class PDFString;
1029  class PDFName;
1030  class PDFStream;
1031  class PDFNull;
1032  class PDFIndirectObject;
1033  class PDFReferenceCall;
1034 
1035  class PDFObject
1036  {
1037  public:
1038  virtual ~PDFObject()
1039  {
1040  }
1041 
1042  virtual PDFObjectTypes getType() = 0;
1043 
1044  virtual PDFString* getString()
1045  {
1046  return NULL;
1047  }
1048 
1049  bool isString()
1050  {
1051  return getType() == string;
1052  }
1053 
1054  virtual PDFDictionary* getDictionary()
1055  {
1056  return NULL;
1057  }
1058 
1059  bool isDictionary()
1060  {
1061  return getType() == dictionary;
1062  }
1063 
1064  virtual PDFBoolean* getBoolean()
1065  {
1066  return NULL;
1067  }
1068 
1069  bool isBoolean()
1070  {
1071  return getType() == boolean;
1072  }
1073 
1074  virtual PDFNumericFloat* getNumericFloat()
1075  {
1076  return NULL;
1077  }
1078 
1079  bool isNumericFloat()
1080  {
1081  return getType() == float_numeric;
1082  }
1083 
1084  virtual PDFNumericInteger* getNumericInteger()
1085  {
1086  return NULL;
1087  }
1088 
1089  bool isNumericInteger()
1090  {
1091  return getType() == int_numeric;
1092  }
1093 
1094  virtual PDFArray* getArray()
1095  {
1096  return NULL;
1097  }
1098 
1099  bool isArray()
1100  {
1101  return getType() == array;
1102  }
1103 
1104  virtual PDFName* getName()
1105  {
1106  return NULL;
1107  }
1108 
1109  bool isName()
1110  {
1111  return getType() == name;
1112  }
1113 
1114  virtual PDFStream* getStream()
1115  {
1116  return NULL;
1117  }
1118 
1119  bool isStream()
1120  {
1121  return getType() == stream;
1122  }
1123 
1124  virtual PDFNull* getNull()
1125  {
1126  return NULL;
1127  }
1128 
1129  bool isNull()
1130  {
1131  return getType() == null;
1132  }
1133 
1134  virtual PDFIndirectObject* getIndirectObject()
1135  {
1136  return NULL;
1137  }
1138 
1139  virtual bool isIndirectObject()
1140  {
1141  return false;
1142  }
1143 
1144  virtual PDFReferenceCall* getReferenceCall()
1145  {
1146  return NULL;
1147  }
1148 
1149  virtual bool isReferenceCall()
1150  {
1151  return false;
1152  }
1153  };
1154 
1155  class PDFDictionary : public PDFObject
1156  {
1157  public:
1158  std::map<std::string, PDFObject*> m_objects;
1159 
1160  ~PDFDictionary()
1161  {
1162  clearDictionary();
1163  }
1164 
1165  void clearDictionary()
1166  {
1167  std::map<std::string, PDFObject*>::iterator it;
1168  for (it = m_objects.begin(); it != m_objects.end(); ++it)
1169  delete it->second;
1170  m_objects.clear();
1171  }
1172 
1173  PDFObject* operator [](const std::string& key)
1174  {
1175  std::map<std::string, PDFObject*>::iterator it = m_objects.find(key);
1176  if (it == m_objects.end())
1177  return NULL;
1178  return it->second;
1179  }
1180 
1181  PDFDictionary* getObjAsDictionary(const std::string& key)
1182  {
1183  std::map<std::string, PDFObject*>::iterator it = m_objects.find(key);
1184  if (it == m_objects.end())
1185  {
1186  return NULL;
1187  }
1188  return it->second->getDictionary();
1189  }
1190 
1191  PDFBoolean* getObjAsBoolean(const std::string& key)
1192  {
1193  std::map<std::string, PDFObject*>::iterator it = m_objects.find(key);
1194  if (it == m_objects.end())
1195  {
1196  return NULL;
1197  }
1198  return it->second->getBoolean();
1199  }
1200 
1201  bool getValAsBoolean(const std::string& key, bool def)
1202  {
1203  std::map<std::string, PDFObject*>::iterator it = m_objects.find(key);
1204  if (it == m_objects.end())
1205  return def;
1206  PDFBoolean* val = it->second->getBoolean();
1207  if (val)
1208  return val->m_value;
1209  return def;
1210  }
1211 
1212  PDFNumericInteger* getObjAsNumericInteger(const std::string& key)
1213  {
1214  std::map<std::string, PDFObject*>::iterator it = m_objects.find(key);
1215  if (it == m_objects.end())
1216  return NULL;
1217  return it->second->getNumericInteger();
1218  }
1219 
1220  PDFNumericFloat* getObjAsNumericFloat(const std::string& key)
1221  {
1222  std::map<std::string, PDFObject*>::iterator it = m_objects.find(key);
1223  if (it == m_objects.end())
1224  return NULL;
1225  return it->second->getNumericFloat();
1226  }
1227 
1228  double getValAsDouble(const std::string& key, double def)
1229  {
1230  std::map<std::string, PDFObject*>::iterator it = m_objects.find(key);
1231  if (it == m_objects.end())
1232  return def;
1233  PDFNumericFloat* float_val = it->second->getNumericFloat();
1234  if (float_val)
1235  return float_val->m_value;
1236  PDFNumericInteger* int_val = it->second->getNumericInteger();
1237  if (int_val)
1238  return (double)int_val->m_value;
1239  return def;
1240  }
1241 
1242  long getValAsInteger(const std::string& key, long def)
1243  {
1244  std::map<std::string, PDFObject*>::iterator it = m_objects.find(key);
1245  if (it == m_objects.end())
1246  return def;
1247  PDFNumericInteger* int_val = it->second->getNumericInteger();
1248  if (int_val)
1249  return int_val->m_value;
1250  return def;
1251  }
1252 
1253  PDFArray* getObjAsArray(const std::string& key)
1254  {
1255  std::map<std::string, PDFObject*>::iterator it = m_objects.find(key);
1256  if (it == m_objects.end())
1257  return NULL;
1258  return it->second->getArray();
1259  }
1260 
1261  PDFString* getObjAsString(const std::string& key)
1262  {
1263  std::map<std::string, PDFObject*>::iterator it = m_objects.find(key);
1264  if (it == m_objects.end())
1265  return NULL;
1266  return it->second->getString();
1267  }
1268 
1269  PDFName* getObjAsName(const std::string& key)
1270  {
1271  std::map<std::string, PDFObject*>::iterator it = m_objects.find(key);
1272  if (it == m_objects.end())
1273  return NULL;
1274  return it->second->getName();
1275  }
1276 
1277  std::string getValAsString(const std::string& key, const std::string& def)
1278  {
1279  std::map<std::string, PDFObject*>::iterator it = m_objects.find(key);
1280  if (it == m_objects.end())
1281  return def;
1282  PDFString* str_obj = it->second->getString();
1283  if (str_obj)
1284  {
1285  str_obj->ConvertToLiteral();
1286  return str_obj->m_value;
1287  }
1288  PDFName* name_obj = it->second->getName();
1289  if (name_obj)
1290  {
1291  return name_obj->m_value;
1292  }
1293  return def;
1294  }
1295 
1296  PDFNull* getObjAsNull(const std::string& key)
1297  {
1298  std::map<std::string, PDFObject*>::iterator it = m_objects.find(key);
1299  if (it == m_objects.end())
1300  return NULL;
1301  return it->second->getNull();
1302  }
1303 
1304  PDFReferenceCall* getObjAsReferenceCall(const std::string& key)
1305  {
1306  std::map<std::string, PDFObject*>::iterator it = m_objects.find(key);
1307  if (it == m_objects.end())
1308  {
1309  return NULL;
1310  }
1311  return it->second->getReferenceCall();
1312  }
1313 
1314  PDFStream* getObjAsStream(const std::string& key)
1315  {
1316  std::map<std::string, PDFObject*>::iterator it = m_objects.find(key);
1317  if (it == m_objects.end())
1318  {
1319  return NULL;
1320  }
1321  return it->second->getStream();
1322  }
1323 
1324  PDFObjectTypes getType()
1325  {
1326  return dictionary;
1327  }
1328 
1329  PDFDictionary* getDictionary()
1330  {
1331  return this;
1332  }
1333  };
1334 
1335  class PDFBoolean : public PDFObject
1336  {
1337  public:
1338  bool m_value;
1339 
1340  PDFBoolean()
1341  {
1342  m_value == false;
1343  }
1344 
1345  bool& operator ()()
1346  {
1347  return m_value;
1348  }
1349 
1350  PDFObjectTypes getType()
1351  {
1352  return boolean;
1353  }
1354 
1355  PDFBoolean* getBoolean()
1356  {
1357  return this;
1358  }
1359  };

1361  class PDFNumericInteger : public PDFObject
1362  {
1363  public:
1364  long m_value;
1365 
1366  PDFNumericInteger()
1367  {
1368  m_value = 0;
1369  }
1370 
1371  long& operator()()
1372  {
1373  return m_value;
1374  }
1375 
1376  PDFObjectTypes getType()
1377  {
1378  return int_numeric;
1379  }
1380 
1381  PDFNumericInteger* getNumericInteger()
1382  {
1383  return this;
1384  }
1385  };

1387  class PDFNumericFloat : public PDFObject
1388  {
1389  public:
1390  double m_value;
1391 
1392  PDFNumericFloat()
1393  {
1394  m_value = 0.0;
1395  }
1396 
1397  double& operator()()
1398  {
1399  return m_value;
1400  }
1401 
1402  PDFObjectTypes getType()
1403  {
1404  return float_numeric;
1405  }
1406 
1407  PDFNumericFloat* getNumericFloat()
1408  {
1409  return this;
1410  }
1411  };
1412 
1413  class PDFArray : public PDFObject
1414  {
1415  public:
1416  std::vector<PDFObject*> m_objects;
1417 
1418  ~PDFArray()
1419  {
1420  for (size_t i = 0; i < m_objects.size(); ++i)
1421  delete m_objects[i];
1422  m_objects.clear();
1423  }
1424 
1425  PDFObject* operator [](unsigned long index)
1426  {
1427  return m_objects[index];
1428  }
1429 
1430  PDFDictionary* getObjAsDictionary(unsigned long index)
1431  {
1432  return m_objects[index]->getDictionary();
1433  }
1434 
1435  PDFBoolean* getObjAsBoolean(unsigned long index)
1436  {
1437  return m_objects[index]->getBoolean();
1438  }
1439 
1440  bool getValAsBoolean(unsigned long index, bool def)
1441  {
1442  PDFObject* obj = m_objects[index];
1443  PDFBoolean* val = obj->getBoolean();
1444  if (val)
1445  return val->m_value;
1446  return def;
1447  }
1448 
1449  PDFNumericInteger* getObjAsNumericInteger(unsigned long index)
1450  {
1451  return m_objects[index]->getNumericInteger();
1452  }
1453 
1454  PDFNumericFloat* getObjAsNumericFloat(unsigned long index)
1455  {
1456  return m_objects[index]->getNumericFloat();
1457  }
1458 
1459  PDFArray* getObjAsArray(unsigned long index)
1460  {
1461  return m_objects[index]->getArray();
1462  }
1463 
1464  double getValAsDouble(unsigned long index, double def)
1465  {
1466  PDFObject* obj = m_objects[index];
1467  PDFNumericFloat* float_val = obj->getNumericFloat();
1468  if (float_val)
1469  return float_val->m_value;
1470  PDFNumericInteger* int_val = obj->getNumericInteger();
1471  if (int_val)
1472  return (double)int_val->m_value;
1473  return def;
1474  }
1475 
1476  long getValAsInteger(unsigned long index, long def)
1477  {
1478  PDFObject* obj = m_objects[index];
1479  PDFNumericInteger* int_val = obj->getNumericInteger();
1480  if (int_val)
1481  return int_val->m_value;
1482  return def;
1483  }
1484 
1485  PDFStream* getObjAsStream(unsigned long index)
1486  {
1487  return m_objects[index]->getStream();
1488  }
1489 
1490  PDFString* getObjAsString(unsigned long index)
1491  {
1492  return m_objects[index]->getString();
1493  }
1494 
1495  PDFName* getObjAsName(unsigned long index)
1496  {
1497  return m_objects[index]->getName();
1498  }
1499 
1500  std::string getValAsString(unsigned long index, const std::string& def)
1501  {
1502  PDFObject* obj = m_objects[index];
1503  PDFString* str_obj = obj->getString();
1504  if (str_obj)
1505  {
1506  str_obj->ConvertToLiteral();
1507  return str_obj->m_value;
1508  }
1509  PDFName* name_obj = obj->getName();
1510  if (name_obj)
1511  return name_obj->m_value;
1512  return def;
1513  }
1514 
1515  PDFNull* getObjAsNull(unsigned long index)
1516  {
1517  return m_objects[index]->getNull();
1518  }
1519 
1520  PDFReferenceCall* getObjAsReferenceCall(unsigned long index)
1521  {
1522  return m_objects[index]->getReferenceCall();
1523  }
1524 
1525  PDFObjectTypes getType()
1526  {
1527  return array;
1528  }
1529 
1530  PDFArray* getArray()
1531  {
1532  return this;
1533  }
1534 
1535  size_t Size()
1536  {
1537  return m_objects.size();
1538  }
1539  };
1540 
1541  class PDFString : public PDFObject
1542  {
1543  public:
1544  bool m_is_hex;
1545  std::string m_value;
1546 
1547  PDFString()
1548  {
1549  m_is_hex = false;
1550  }
1551 
1552  std::string& operator()()
1553  {
1554  return m_value;
1555  }
1556 
1557  bool IsHex()
1558  {
1559  return m_is_hex;
1560  }
1561 
1562  bool IsLiteral()
1563  {
1564  return !m_is_hex;
1565  }
1566 
1567  void ConvertToHex()
1568  {
1569  if (!m_is_hex)
1570  {
1571  m_is_hex = true;
1572  std::string tmp;
1573  tmp.reserve(m_value.length() * 2);
1574  for (size_t i = 0; i < m_value.length(); ++i)
1575  tmp += char_to_hex_char(m_value[i]);
1576  m_value = tmp;
1577  }
1578  }
1579 
1580  void ConvertToLiteral()
1581  {
1582  if (m_is_hex)
1583  {
1584  m_is_hex = false;
1585  std::string tmp;
1586  tmp.reserve(m_value.length() / 2);
1587  for (size_t i = 0; i < m_value.length(); i += 2)
1588  tmp += hex_char_to_single_char(&m_value[i]);
1589  m_value = tmp;
1590  }
1591  }
1592 
1593  PDFObjectTypes getType()
1594  {
1595  return string;
1596  }
1597 
1598  PDFString* getString()
1599  {
1600  return this;
1601  }
1602  };
1603 
1604  class PDFName : public PDFObject
1605  {
1606  public:
1607  std::string m_value;
1608 
1609  std::string& operator ()()
1610  {
1611  return m_value;
1612  }
1613 
1614  PDFObjectTypes getType()
1615  {
1616  return name;
1617  }
1618 
1619  PDFName* getName()
1620  {
1621  return this;
1622  }
1623  };
1624 
1625  class PDFStream : public PDFObject
1626  {
1627  private:
1628  typedef std::vector<unsigned char> lzw_item;
1629 
1630  class Predictior
1631  {
1632  public:
1633  size_t m_predictor;
1634  size_t m_colors;
1635  size_t m_bpc;
1636  size_t m_columns;
1637  size_t m_early_change;
1638  bool m_next_byte_is_predictor;
1639  int m_current_predictor;
1640  int m_current_row_index;
1641  int m_bpp;
1642  std::vector<char> m_previos;
1643 
1644  Predictior(PDFDictionary& decode_params)
1645  {
1646  try
1647  {
1648  m_predictor = 1;
1649  PDFNumericInteger* pred_numeric = decode_params.getObjAsNumericInteger("Predictor");
1650  if (pred_numeric)
1651  m_predictor = (*pred_numeric)();
1652 
1653  m_colors = 1;
1654  PDFNumericInteger* color_numeric = decode_params.getObjAsNumericInteger("Colors");
1655  if (color_numeric)
1656  m_colors = (*color_numeric)();
1657 
1658  m_bpc = 8;
1659  PDFNumericInteger* bpc_numeric = decode_params.getObjAsNumericInteger("BitsPerComponent");
1660  if (bpc_numeric)
1661  m_colors = (*bpc_numeric)();
1662 
1663  m_columns = 1;
1664  PDFNumericInteger* columns_numeric = decode_params.getObjAsNumericInteger("Columns");
1665  if (columns_numeric)
1666  m_columns = (*columns_numeric)();
1667 
1668  m_early_change = 1;
1669  PDFNumericInteger* early_change_numeric = decode_params.getObjAsNumericInteger("EarlyChange");
1670  if (early_change_numeric)
1671  m_early_change = (*early_change_numeric)();
1672  }
1673  catch (Exception& ex)
1674  {
1675  ex.appendError("Error while creating predictor handler for decoding");
1676  throw;
1677  }
1678 
1679  if (m_predictor >= 10)
1680  {
1681  m_next_byte_is_predictor = true;
1682  m_current_predictor = -1;
1683  }
1684  else
1685  {
1686  m_next_byte_is_predictor = false;
1687  m_current_predictor = m_predictor;
1688  }
1689  m_current_row_index = 0;
1690  m_bpp = (m_bpc * m_colors) >> 3;
1691  m_previos.resize((m_columns * m_colors * m_bpc) >> 3, 0);
1692  }
1693 
1694  void decode(unsigned char* src, unsigned int src_len, std::vector<unsigned char>& dest)
1695  {
1696  if (m_predictor == 1)
1697  {
1698  for (size_t i = 0; i < src_len; ++i)
1699  dest.push_back(src[i]);
1700  return;
1701  }
1702  size_t read_index = 0;
1703  while (read_index < src_len)
1704  {
1705  char ch = src[read_index++];
1706  if (m_next_byte_is_predictor)
1707  {
1708  m_current_predictor = ch + 10;
1709  m_next_byte_is_predictor = false;
1710  }
1711  else
1712  {
1713  switch (m_current_predictor)
1714  {
1715  case 2:
1716  {
1717  if (m_bpc == 8)
1718  {
1719  int tmp = 0;
1720  if (m_current_row_index - m_bpp >= 0)
1721  tmp = m_previos[m_current_row_index - m_bpp];
1722  m_previos[m_current_row_index++] = ch + tmp;
1723  break;
1724  }
1725  throw Exception("Predictor cannot decode data, unsupported bpc value: " + m_bpc);
1726  }
1727  case 10:
1728  {
1729  m_previos[m_current_row_index++] = ch;
1730  break;
1731  }
1732  case 11:
1733  {
1734  int tmp = 0;
1735  if (m_current_row_index - m_bpp >= 0)
1736  tmp = m_previos[m_current_row_index - m_bpp];
1737  m_previos[m_current_row_index++] = ch + tmp;
1738  break;
1739  }
1740  case 12:
1741  {
1742  m_previos[m_current_row_index++] += ch;
1743  break;
1744  }
1745  case 13:
1746  {
1747  int tmp = 0;
1748  if (m_current_row_index - m_bpp >= 0)
1749  tmp = m_previos[m_current_row_index - m_bpp];
1750  m_previos[m_current_row_index++] = ((tmp + m_previos[m_current_row_index]) >> 1) + ch;
1751  break;
1752  }
1753  case 14:
1754  case 15:
1755  throw Exception("Predictor cannot decode data, unsupported predictor value: " + uint_to_string(m_current_predictor));
1756  }
1757  }
1758 
1759  if (m_current_row_index >= m_previos.size())
1760  {
1761  m_current_row_index = 0;
1762  m_next_byte_is_predictor = m_current_predictor >= 10;
1763  for (size_t i = 0; i < m_previos.size(); ++i)
1764  dest.push_back(m_previos[i]);
1765  }
1766  }
1767  }
1768  };
1769 
1770  struct CompressedObjectInfo
1771  {
1772  size_t m_offset;
1773  size_t m_index;
1774  };
1775 
1776  public:
1777  //iterates throw all elements in stream data. This kind of object can exist without PDFStream.
1778  //PDFStream only provides data for iterator.
1779  class PDFStreamIterator
1780  {
1781  private:
1782  struct Pointer
1783  {
1784  char* m_buffer;
1785  size_t m_element_size;
1786  size_t m_buffer_size;
1787  PDFObjectTypes m_type;
1788  };
1789  std::vector<Pointer> m_pointers_stack;
1790  size_t m_depth;
1791 
1792  public:
1793  void init(char* buffer, size_t buffer_size)
1794  {
1795  Pointer ptr;
1796  ptr.m_buffer = buffer;
1797  ptr.m_buffer_size = buffer_size;
1798  ptr.m_element_size = buffer_size;
1799  ptr.m_type = array; //treat stream like a big array
1800  m_depth = 0;
1801  m_pointers_stack.push_back(ptr);
1802  }
1803 
1804  void seek(size_t offset)
1805  {
1806  Pointer* ptr = &m_pointers_stack[m_depth];
1807  if (offset > ptr->m_buffer_size)
1808  {
1809  throw Exception(std::string("PDF Stream iterator: Cant seek. Offset: ") + uint_to_string(offset) +
1810  std::string(", size of buffer: ") + uint_to_string(ptr->m_buffer_size));
1811  }
1812  ptr->m_buffer_size -= offset;
1813  ptr->m_element_size = 0;
1814  ptr->m_type = null;
1815  ptr->m_buffer += offset;
1816  }
1817 
1818  void backToRoot()
1819  {
1820  char* buffer = m_pointers_stack[0].m_buffer;
1821  size_t buffer_size = m_pointers_stack[0].m_buffer_size;
1822  m_pointers_stack.clear();
1823  init(buffer, buffer_size);
1824  }
1825 
1826  bool canDown()
1827  {
1828  PDFObjectTypes type = m_pointers_stack[m_depth].m_type;
1829  return type == array || type == dictionary;
1830  }
1831 
1832  void levelDown()
1833  {
1834  if (!canDown())
1835  throw Exception("PDF Stream iterator: cant go down. Type of object is not dictionary nor array");
1836  Pointer* prev_ptr = &m_pointers_stack[m_depth];
1837  ++m_depth;
1838  Pointer ptr;
1839  ptr.m_buffer = prev_ptr->m_buffer;
1840  if (prev_ptr->m_type == array)
1841  {
1842  ptr.m_buffer += 1;
1843  ptr.m_buffer_size = prev_ptr->m_element_size - 2;
1844  }
1845  else if (prev_ptr->m_type == dictionary)
1846  {
1847  ptr.m_buffer += 2;
1848  ptr.m_buffer_size = prev_ptr->m_element_size - 4;
1849  }
1850  ptr.m_element_size = 0;
1851  ptr.m_type = null;
1852  m_pointers_stack.push_back(ptr);
1853  }
1854 
1855  void getNextElement()
1856  {
1857  Pointer* ptr = &m_pointers_stack[m_depth];
1858  ptr->m_buffer += ptr->m_element_size;
1859  ptr->m_buffer_size -= ptr->m_element_size;
1860  ptr->m_element_size = 0;
1861  ptr->m_type = null;
1862 
1863  if (ptr->m_buffer_size == 0)
1864  {
1865  ptr->m_type = null;
1866  return;
1867  }
1868  while (ptr->m_buffer_size > 0)
1869  {
1870  switch (ptr->m_buffer[0])
1871  {
1872  case '/':
1873  {
1874  ++ptr->m_element_size;
1875  ptr->m_type = name;
1876  readName(*ptr);
1877  return;
1878  }
1879  case '<':
1880  {
1881  ++ptr->m_element_size;
1882  if (ptr->m_buffer_size > ptr->m_element_size)
1883  {
1884  if (ptr->m_buffer[1] == '<')
1885  {
1886  ptr->m_type = dictionary;
1887  ++ptr->m_element_size;
1888  readDictionary(*ptr);
1889  }
1890  else
1891  {
1892  ptr->m_type = string;
1893  readHexString(*ptr);
1894  }
1895  }
1896  else
1897  ptr->m_type = null;
1898  return;
1899  }
1900  case '[':
1901  {
1902  ++ptr->m_element_size;
1903  ptr->m_type = array;
1904  readArray(*ptr);
1905  return;
1906  }
1907  case '(':
1908  {
1909  ++ptr->m_element_size;
1910  ptr->m_type = string;
1911  readLiteralString(*ptr);
1912  return;
1913  }
1914  case '+':
1915  case '-':
1916  case '.':
1917  {
1918  ++ptr->m_element_size;
1919  if (ptr->m_buffer[0] == '.')
1920  ptr->m_type = float_numeric;
1921  else
1922  ptr->m_type = int_numeric;
1923  readNumeric(*ptr);
1924  return;
1925  }
1926  case '%':
1927  {
1928  //this is some comment we are not interested in.
1929  ++ptr->m_buffer;
1930  --ptr->m_buffer_size;
1931  while (ptr->m_buffer_size > 0)
1932  {
1933  if (ptr->m_buffer[0] != 13 && ptr->m_buffer[0] != 10)
1934  {
1935  ++ptr->m_buffer;
1936  --ptr->m_buffer_size;
1937  }
1938  else
1939  break;
1940  }
1941  break;
1942  }
1943  case '0':
1944  case '1':
1945  case '2':
1946  case '3':
1947  case '4':
1948  case '5':
1949  case '6':
1950  case '7':
1951  case '8':
1952  case '9': //numeric or reference
1953  {
1954  size_t s = 0;
1955  size_t spaces = 0;
1956  //check if this object is numeric or reference
1957  while (s < ptr->m_buffer_size)
1958  {
1959  char ch = ptr->m_buffer[s++];
1960  switch (ch)
1961  {
1962  case ' ':
1963  {
1964  ++spaces;
1965  if (spaces > 2)
1966  {
1967  ptr->m_type = int_numeric;
1968  readNumeric(*ptr);
1969  return;
1970  }
1971  break;
1972  }
1973  case 'R':
1974  {
1975  if (spaces == 2)
1976  {
1977  ptr->m_type = reference_call;
1978  readReferenceCall(*ptr);
1979  return;
1980  }
1981  ptr->m_type = int_numeric;
1982  readNumeric(*ptr);
1983  return;
1984  }
1985  case '0':
1986  case '1':
1987  case '2':
1988  case '3':
1989  case '4':
1990  case '5':
1991  case '6':
1992  case '7':
1993  case '8':
1994  case '9':
1995  {
1996  break;
1997  }
1998  default:
1999  {
2000  ptr->m_type = int_numeric;
2001  readNumeric(*ptr);
2002  return;
2003  }
2004  }
2005  }
2006  ptr->m_type = int_numeric;
2007  readNumeric(*ptr);
2008  return;
2009  }
2010  case 0:
2011  case 9:
2012  case 10:
2013  case 12:
2014  case 13:
2015  case 32:
2016  {
2017  break;
2018  }
2019  case 'f':
2020  {
2021  if (ptr->m_buffer_size >= 5 && memcmp(ptr->m_buffer, "false", 5) == 0)
2022  {
2023  ptr->m_type = boolean;
2024  ptr->m_element_size = 5;
2025  return;
2026  }
2027  ptr->m_type = operator_obj;
2028  readOperator(*ptr);
2029  return;
2030  }
2031  case 't':
2032  {
2033  if (ptr->m_buffer_size >= 4 && memcmp(ptr->m_buffer, "true", 4) == 0)
2034  {
2035  ptr->m_type = boolean;
2036  ptr->m_element_size = 4;
2037  return;
2038  }
2039  ptr->m_type = operator_obj;
2040  readOperator(*ptr);
2041  return;
2042  }
2043  case 'n':
2044  {
2045  if (ptr->m_buffer_size >= 4 && memcmp(ptr->m_buffer, "null", 4) == 0)
2046  {
2047  ptr->m_type = null;
2048  ptr->m_element_size = 4;
2049  return;
2050  }
2051  ptr->m_type = operator_obj;
2052  readOperator(*ptr);
2053  return;
2054  }
2055  default:
2056  {
2057  ++ptr->m_element_size;
2058  ptr->m_type = operator_obj;
2059  readOperator(*ptr);
2060  return;
2061  }
2062  }
2063  ++ptr->m_buffer;
2064  --ptr->m_buffer_size;
2065  }
2066  ptr->m_type = null;
2067  }
2068 
2069  bool canUp()
2070  {
2071  return m_depth > 0;
2072  }
2073 
2074  void levelUp()
2075  {
2076  if (!canUp())
2077  throw Exception("PDF Stream iterator: cant go up. Already in root element");
2078  --m_depth;
2079  m_pointers_stack.pop_back();
2080  }
2081 
2082  bool hasNext()
2083  {
2084  Pointer* ptr = &m_pointers_stack[m_depth];
2085  return ptr->m_buffer_size - ptr->m_element_size > 0;
2086  }
2087 
2088  const char* getData()
2089  {
2090  return m_pointers_stack[m_depth].m_buffer;
2091  }
2092 
2093  size_t getDataLength()
2094  {
2095  return m_pointers_stack[m_depth].m_element_size;
2096  }
2097 
2098  PDFObjectTypes getType()
2099  {
2100  return m_pointers_stack[m_depth].m_type;
2101  }
2102 
2103  std::string toPlainText()
2104  {
2105  Pointer* ptr = &m_pointers_stack[m_depth];
2106  return std::string(ptr->m_buffer, ptr->m_element_size);
2107  }
2108 
2109  void toHexString(std::string& val)
2110  {
2111  val.clear();
2112  Pointer* ptr = &m_pointers_stack[m_depth];
2113  if (ptr->m_type != string)
2114  throw Exception("PDF Stream iterator: Cannot convert to hex string. Type of object: " + ptr->m_type);
2115  if (ptr->m_element_size == 0)
2116  {
2117  val = "00";
2118  return;
2119  }
2120  //already hex
2121  if (ptr->m_buffer[0] == '<')
2122  {
2123  for (int i = 1; i < ptr->m_element_size - 1; ++i) //skip < and >
2124  {
2125  if (hex_char_is_valid(ptr->m_buffer[i]))
2126  val += ptr->m_buffer[i];
2127  }
2128  if (val.length() % 2 == 1)
2129  val += '0';
2130  }
2131  //convert from literal to hex
2132  else
2133  {
2134  for (int i = 1; i < ptr->m_element_size - 1; ++i) //skip ( and )
2135  {
2136  if (ptr->m_buffer[i] == '\\')
2137  {
2138  ++i;
2139  if (i < ptr->m_element_size - 1)
2140  {
2141  switch (ptr->m_buffer[i])
2142  {
2143  case 'n':
2144  case 10:
2145  {
2146  val += "0A";
2147  break;
2148  }
2149  case 't':
2150  case 9:
2151  {
2152  val += "09";
2153  break;
2154  }
2155  case 'f':
2156  case 12:
2157  {
2158  val += "0C";
2159  break;
2160  }
2161  case 8:
2162  case 'b':
2163  {
2164  val += "08";
2165  break;
2166  }
2167  case 'r':
2168  case 13:
2169  {
2170  val += "0D";
2171  break;
2172  }
2173  case '\\':
2174  {
2175  val += "5C";
2176  break;
2177  }
2178  case '(':
2179  {
2180  val += "28";
2181  break;
2182  }
2183  case ')':
2184  {
2185  val += "29";
2186  break;
2187  }
2188  case '0':
2189  case '1':
2190  case '2':
2191  case '3':
2192  case '4':
2193  case '5':
2194  case '6':
2195  case '7':
2196  case '8':
2197  case '9':
2198  {
2199  if (i < ptr->m_element_size - 3)
2200  {
2201  char octal[3];
2202  octal[0] = ptr->m_buffer[i];
2203  octal[1] = ptr->m_buffer[i + 1];
2204  octal[2] = ptr->m_buffer[i + 2];
2205  i += 2;
2206  char res = ((octal[0] - '0') << 6);
2207  res = res | ((octal[1] - '0') << 3);
2208  res = res | (octal[2] - '0');
2209  val += char_to_hex_char(res);
2210  }
2211  break;
2212  }
2213  }
2214  }
2215  }
2216  else
2217  val += char_to_hex_char(ptr->m_buffer[i]);
2218  }
2219  }
2220  }
2221 
2222  double toDouble()
2223  {
2224  Pointer* ptr = &m_pointers_stack[m_depth];
2225  if (ptr->m_type != int_numeric && ptr->m_type != float_numeric)
2226  throw Exception("PDF Stream iterator: Error while converting to double. Current type is: " + ptr->m_type);
2227  return strtod(ptr->m_buffer, NULL);
2228  }
2229 
2230  long toLong()
2231  {
2232  Pointer* ptr = &m_pointers_stack[m_depth];
2233  if (ptr->m_type != int_numeric)
2234  throw Exception("PDF Stream iterator: Error while converting to long. Current type is: " + ptr->m_type);
2235  return strtol(ptr->m_buffer, NULL, 10);
2236  }
2237 
2238  private:
2239  void readOperator(Pointer& ptr)
2240  {
2241  while (ptr.m_element_size < ptr.m_buffer_size)
2242  {
2243  switch (ptr.m_buffer[ptr.m_element_size])
2244  {
2245  case 0:
2246  case 9:
2247  case 10:
2248  case 13:
2249  case 32:
2250  case '[':
2251  case '{':
2252  case '<':
2253  case '(':
2254  case '%':
2255  {
2256  return;
2257  }
2258  }
2259  ++ptr.m_element_size;
2260  }
2261  }
2262 
2263  void readName(Pointer& ptr)
2264  {
2265  while (ptr.m_element_size < ptr.m_buffer_size)
2266  {
2267  switch (ptr.m_buffer[ptr.m_element_size])
2268  {
2269  case 0:
2270  case 9:
2271  case 10:
2272  case 12:
2273  case 13:
2274  case 32:
2275  case '(':
2276  case ')':
2277  case '<':
2278  case '>':
2279  case '[':
2280  case ']':
2281  case '/':
2282  case '%':
2283  case '{':
2284  case '}':
2285  {
2286  return;
2287  }
2288  }
2289  ++ptr.m_element_size;
2290  }
2291  }
2292 
2293  void readDictionary(Pointer& ptr)
2294  {
2295  char ch = 0, prev;
2296  int count = 0;
2297  int parentheses = 0;
2298  bool inside_comment = false;
2299  while (ptr.m_element_size < ptr.m_buffer_size)
2300  {
2301  prev = ch;
2302  ch = ptr.m_buffer[ptr.m_element_size++];
2303  switch (ch)
2304  {
2305  case '<':
2306  {
2307  if (parentheses == 0 && !inside_comment)
2308  ++count;
2309  break;
2310  }
2311  case '>':
2312  {
2313  if (parentheses == 0 && !inside_comment)
2314  {
2315  --count;
2316  if (count == -2) //we have reached closing '>>'
2317  return;
2318  }
2319  break;
2320  }
2321  case '%':
2322  {
2323  if (parentheses == 0)
2324  inside_comment = true;
2325  break;
2326  }
2327  case 10:
2328  case 13:
2329  {
2330  inside_comment = false;
2331  break;
2332  }
2333  case '(':
2334  {
2335  if (!inside_comment && (parentheses == 0 || prev != '\\'))
2336  ++parentheses;
2337  break;
2338  }
2339  case ')':
2340  {
2341  if (!inside_comment && prev != '\\' && parentheses > 0)
2342  --parentheses;
2343  break;
2344  }
2345  case '\\':
2346  {
2347  if (prev == '\\')
2348  {
2349  prev = 0;
2350  ch = 0;
2351  }
2352  break;
2353  }
2354  }
2355  }
2356  throw Exception("PDF Stream iterator: invalid dictionary, could not found '>>'");
2357  }
2358 
2359  void readHexString(Pointer& ptr)
2360  {
2361  char ch;
2362  while (ptr.m_element_size < ptr.m_buffer_size)
2363  {
2364  ch = ptr.m_buffer[ptr.m_element_size++];
2365  if (ch == '>')
2366  return;
2367  if (ch >= 'a' && ch <= 'f')
2368  {
2369  ptr.m_buffer[ptr.m_element_size - 1] -= ('a' - 'A');
2370  ch -= ('a' - 'A');
2371  }
2372  }
2373  throw Exception("PDF Stream iterator: invalid hex string, could not found '>' character");
2374  }
2375 
2376  //literral 内容
2377  void readLiteralString(Pointer& ptr)
2378  {
2379  char ch = 0, prev;
2380  int count = 0;
2381  while (ptr.m_element_size < ptr.m_buffer_size)
2382  {
2383  prev = ch;
2384  ch = ptr.m_buffer[ptr.m_element_size++];
2385  switch (ch)
2386  {
2387  case '(':
2388  {
2389  if (prev != '\\')
2390  {
2391  ++count;
2392  }
2393  break;
2394  }
2395  case ')':
2396  {
2397  if (prev != '\\')
2398  {
2399  --count;
2400  }
2401  if (count == -1) //we have reached closing ')'
2402  {
2403  return;
2404  }
2405  break;
2406  }
2407  case '\\':
2408  {
2409  if (prev == '\\')
2410  {
2411  prev = 0;
2412  ch = 0;
2413  }
2414  break;
2415  }
2416  }
2417  }
2418  throw Exception("PDF Stream iterator: invalid literal string, could not found ')' character");
2419  }
2420 
2421  void readNumeric(Pointer& ptr)
2422  {
2423  while (ptr.m_element_size < ptr.m_buffer_size)
2424  {
2425  switch (ptr.m_buffer[ptr.m_element_size])
2426  {
2427  case '.':
2428  {
2429  ptr.m_type = float_numeric;
2430  break;
2431  }
2432  case '0':
2433  case '1':
2434  case '2':
2435  case '3':
2436  case '4':
2437  case '5':
2438  case '6':
2439  case '7':
2440  case '8':
2441  case '9':
2442  {
2443  break;
2444  }
2445  default:
2446  {
2447  return;
2448  }
2449  }
2450  ++ptr.m_element_size;
2451  }
2452  }
2453 
2454  void readReferenceCall(Pointer& ptr)
2455  {
2456  while (ptr.m_element_size < ptr.m_buffer_size)
2457  {
2458  if (ptr.m_buffer[ptr.m_element_size++] == 'R')
2459  return;
2460  }
2461  throw Exception("PDF Stream iterator: invalid referece, could not found 'R' character");
2462  }
2463 
2464  void readArray(Pointer& ptr)
2465  {
2466  char ch = 0, prev;
2467  int count = 0;
2468  int parentheses = 0;
2469  bool inside_comment = false;
2470  while (ptr.m_element_size < ptr.m_buffer_size)
2471  {
2472  prev = ch;
2473  ch = ptr.m_buffer[ptr.m_element_size++];
2474  switch (ch)
2475  {
2476  case '[':
2477  {
2478  if (parentheses == 0 && !inside_comment)
2479  ++count;
2480  break;
2481  }
2482  case ']':
2483  {
2484  if (parentheses == 0 && !inside_comment)
2485  {
2486  --count;
2487  if (count == -1) //we have reached closing ']'
2488  return;
2489  }
2490  break;
2491  }
2492  case '%':
2493  {
2494  if (parentheses == 0)
2495  inside_comment = true;
2496  break;
2497  }
2498  case 10:
2499  case 13:
2500  {
2501  inside_comment = false;
2502  break;
2503  }
2504  case '(':
2505  {
2506  if (!inside_comment && prev != '\\')
2507  ++parentheses;
2508  break;
2509  }
2510  case ')':
2511  {
2512  if (!inside_comment && prev != '\\' && parentheses > 0)
2513  --parentheses;
2514  break;
2515  }
2516  case '\\':
2517  {
2518  if (prev == '\\')
2519  {
2520  prev = 0;
2521  ch = 0;
2522  }
2523  break;
2524  }
2525  }
2526  }
2527  throw Exception("PDF Stream iterator: invalid array");
2528  }
2529  };
2530 
2531  PDFDictionary* m_dictionary;
2532  char* m_stream_data_buffer; //buffer for decoded stream
2533  size_t m_stream_data_buffer_len;
2534  size_t m_position;
2535  size_t m_size;
2536  bool m_is_in_external_file; //are the data for this stream outside of this file?
2537  bool m_is_obj_stream; //is this stream a collection of compressed object?
2538  bool m_is_decoded; //is this stream decoded?
2539  bool m_loaded_compressed_objects; //if this stream has compressed objects, are they loaded?
2540 
2541  private:
2542  std::vector<CompressedObjectInfo> m_compressed_objects;
2543  PDFStreamIterator m_stream_iterator;
2544  PDFReader* m_reader;
2545 
2546  public:
2547  PDFStream(PDFReader& reader, PDFDictionary& dictionary)
2548  {
2549  m_is_in_external_file = false;
2550  m_loaded_compressed_objects = false;
2551  m_is_decoded = true;
2552  m_is_obj_stream = false;
2553  m_stream_data_buffer = NULL;
2554  m_stream_data_buffer_len = 0;
2555  m_dictionary = &dictionary;
2556  m_position = 0;
2557  m_size = 0;
2558  m_reader = &reader;
2559  }
2560 
2561  ~PDFStream()
2562  {
2563  if (m_stream_data_buffer)
2564  delete[] m_stream_data_buffer;
2565  if (m_dictionary)
2566  delete m_dictionary;
2567  }
2568 
2569  PDFObjectTypes getType()
2570  {
2571  return stream;
2572  }
2573 
2574  PDFStream* getStream()
2575  {
2576  return this;
2577  }
2578 
2579  PDFObject* getCompressedObject(size_t index)
2580  {
2581  try
2582  {
2583  load();
2584  if (!m_is_obj_stream)
2585  throw Exception("Stream does not contain any compressed objects");
2586  if (!m_loaded_compressed_objects)
2587  {
2588  PDFNumericInteger* num_obj_count = m_dictionary->getObjAsNumericInteger("N");
2589  if (!num_obj_count)
2590  throw Exception("Object stream must contain \"N\" entry in its dictionary");
2591  PDFNumericInteger* offset_for_first_obj = m_dictionary->getObjAsNumericInteger("First");
2592  if (!offset_for_first_obj)
2593  throw Exception("Object stream must contain \"First\" entry in its dictionary");
2594  size_t first_offset = (*offset_for_first_obj)();
2595  size_t compressed_objects_count = (*num_obj_count)();
2596  m_stream_iterator.backToRoot();
2597  m_stream_iterator.levelDown();
2598  for (size_t i = 0; i < compressed_objects_count; ++i)
2599  {
2600  CompressedObjectInfo obj_info;
2601  m_stream_iterator.getNextElement();
2602  obj_info.m_index = m_stream_iterator.toLong();
2603  m_stream_iterator.getNextElement();
2604  obj_info.m_offset = m_stream_iterator.toLong() + first_offset;
2605  m_compressed_objects.push_back(obj_info);
2606  }
2607  m_loaded_compressed_objects = true;
2608  }
2609  m_stream_iterator.backToRoot();
2610  m_stream_iterator.levelDown();
2611  if (index >= m_compressed_objects.size())
2612  throw Exception("Specified compressed object does not exist in the stream");
2613  try
2614  {
2615  m_stream_iterator.seek(m_compressed_objects[index].m_offset);
2616  }
2617  catch (Exception& ex)
2618  {
2619  ex.appendError("Cant seek to the compressed object, offset: " + uint_to_string(m_compressed_objects[index].m_offset));
2620  throw;
2621  }
2622  return createNewObjectFromStream();
2623  }
2624  catch (Exception& ex)
2625  {
2626  ex.appendError("Error while reading compressed object number " + uint_to_string(index) + " in the stream");
2627  throw;
2628  }
2629  }
2630 
2631  PDFStreamIterator& getIterator()
2632  {
2633  load();
2634  return m_stream_iterator;
2635  }
2636 
2637  private:
2638  static void ascii_85_decode(std::vector<unsigned char>& src, std::vector<unsigned char>& dest)
2639  {
2640  const unsigned long powers_85[5] = { 85 * 85 * 85 * 85, 85 * 85 * 85, 85 * 85, 85, 1 };
2641  int count = 0;
2642  unsigned int tuple = 0;
2643  size_t index_read = 0;
2644  size_t len = src.size();
2645  dest.clear();
2646 
2647  try
2648  {
2649  while (index_read < len)
2650  {
2651  unsigned char ch = src[index_read++];
2652  switch (ch)
2653  {
2654  case 'z':
2655  if (count != 0)
2656  throw Exception("Count parameter is not equal to zero");
2657  dest.push_back(0);
2658  dest.push_back(0);
2659  dest.push_back(0);
2660  dest.push_back(0);
2661  break;
2662  case '~':
2663  if(index_read < len && src[index_read] != '>')
2664  throw Exception("Invalid end of compressed stream");
2665  return;
2666  case '\n':
2667  case '\r':
2668  case '\t':
2669  case ' ':
2670  case '\0':
2671  case '\f':
2672  case '\b':
2673  case 0177:
2674  break;
2675  default:
2676  if (ch < '!' || ch > 'u')
2677  throw Exception("Invalid character");
2678  tuple += (ch - '!') * powers_85[count++];
2679  if (count == 5)
2680  {
2681  dest.push_back(tuple >> 24);
2682  dest.push_back((tuple & 0x00FF0000) >> 16);
2683  dest.push_back((tuple & 0x0000FF00) >> 8);
2684  dest.push_back(tuple & 0x000000FF);
2685  count = 0;
2686  tuple = 0;
2687  }
2688  break;
2689  }
2690  }
2691  if (count > 0)
2692  {
2693  tuple += powers_85[--count];
2694  int offset = 24;
2695  unsigned int mask = 0xFF000000;
2696  while (count > 0)
2697  {
2698  dest.push_back((tuple && mask) >> offset);
2699  offset -= 8;
2700  mask = mask >> 8;
2701  --count;
2702  }
2703  }
2704  }
2705  catch (Exception& ex)
2706  {
2707  ex.appendError("Error while decoding a stream using ascii-85 algorithm");
2708  throw;
2709  }
2710  }
2711 
2712  static void lzw_decode(std::vector<unsigned char>& src, std::vector<unsigned char>& dest, PDFDictionary* decode_params)
2713  {
2714  const unsigned short masks[4] = { 0x01FF, 0x03FF, 0x07FF, 0x0FFF };
2715  unsigned int mask = 0;
2716  unsigned int code_len = 9;
2717  unsigned char ch = src[0];
2718  unsigned int buffer_size = 0;
2719  unsigned int old = 0;
2720  unsigned int code = 0;
2721  unsigned int buffer = 0;
2722  unsigned int read_index = 0;
2723  Predictior* predictor = NULL;
2724  try
2725  {
2726  if (decode_params)
2727  predictor = new Predictior(*decode_params);
2728  size_t len = src.size();
2729  dest.clear();
2730  dest.reserve(len);
2731  lzw_item item;
2732  std::vector<lzw_item> items_table;
2733  items_table.reserve(4096);
2734  lzw_item data;
2735  for (int i = 0; i < 256; ++i)
2736  {
2737  item.clear();
2738  item.push_back((unsigned char)i);
2739  items_table.push_back(item);
2740  }
2741  item.clear();
2742  items_table.push_back(item);
2743 
2744  while (read_index < len)
2745  {
2746  while (buffer_size <= 16 && read_index < len)
2747  {
2748  buffer <<= 8;
2749  buffer |= (unsigned int)src[read_index];
2750  buffer_size += 8;
2751  ++read_index;
2752  }
2753  while (buffer_size >= code_len)
2754  {
2755  code = (buffer >> (buffer_size - code_len)) & masks[mask];
2756  buffer_size -= code_len;
2757 
2758  if (code == 0x0100)
2759  {
2760  mask = 0;
2761  code_len = 9;
2762  items_table.clear();
2763  for (int i = 0; i < 256; ++i)
2764  {
2765  item.clear();
2766  item.push_back((unsigned char)i);
2767  items_table.push_back(item);
2768  }
2769  item.clear();
2770  items_table.push_back(item);
2771  }
2772  else if (code == 0x0101)
2773  {
2774  if (predictor)
2775  delete predictor;
2776  predictor = NULL;
2777  return;
2778  }
2779  else
2780  {
2781  if (code >= items_table.size())
2782  {
2783  if (old >= items_table.size())
2784  {
2785  if (predictor)
2786  delete predictor;
2787  predictor = NULL;
2788  throw Exception("Index of old and current code are bigger the size of table");
2789  }
2790  data = items_table[old];
2791  data.push_back(ch);
2792  }
2793  else
2794  data = items_table[code];
2795  if (predictor)
2796  {
2797  try
2798  {
2799  predictor->decode(&data[0], data.size(), dest);
2800  }
2801  catch (Exception& ex)
2802  {
2803  delete predictor;
2804  predictor = NULL;
2805  ex.appendError("Error while decoding data by predictor");
2806  throw;
2807  }
2808  }
2809  else
2810  {
2811  for (size_t i = 0; i < data.size(); ++i)
2812  dest.push_back(data[i]);
2813  }
2814  ch = data[0];
2815  if (old < items_table.size())
2816  data = items_table[old];
2817  data.push_back(ch);
2818  items_table.push_back(data);
2819  data.pop_back();
2820  old = code;
2821  switch ((int)items_table.size())
2822  {
2823  case 511:
2824  case 1023:
2825  case 2047:
2826  ++code_len;
2827  ++mask;
2828  }
2829  }
2830  }
2831  }
2832  if (predictor)
2833  delete predictor;
2834  predictor = NULL;
2835  }
2836  catch (std::bad_alloc& ba)
2837  {
2838  if (predictor)
2839  delete predictor;
2840  predictor = NULL;
2841  throw Exception("Bad alloc");
2842  }
2843  catch (Exception& ex)
2844  {
2845  if (predictor)
2846  delete predictor;
2847  predictor = NULL;
2848  ex.appendError("Error while decoding a stream using lzw algorithm");
2849  throw;
2850  }
2851  }
2852 
2853  static void ascii_hex_decode(std::vector<unsigned char>& src, std::vector<unsigned char>& dest)
2854  {
2855  char hex_char[2];
2856  int got = 0;
2857  size_t len = src.size();
2858  size_t read_index = 0;
2859  dest.clear();
2860  try
2861  {
2862  while (read_index != len)
2863  {
2864  char ch = src[read_index++];
2865  if (ch >= 'a' && ch <= 'f')
2866  ch -= ('a' - 'A');
2867  if (ch < '0' || (ch > '9' && ch < 'A') || ch > 'F')
2868  continue;
2869  hex_char[got++] = ch;
2870  if (got == 2)
2871  {
2872  got = 0;
2873  dest.push_back(hex_char_to_single_char(hex_char));
2874  }
2875  }
2876  if (got == 1)
2877  {
2878  hex_char[1] = '0';
2879  dest.push_back(hex_char_to_single_char(hex_char));
2880  }
2881  }
2882  catch (Exception& ex)
2883  {
2884  ex.appendError("Error while decoding a stream using ascii-hex algorithm");
2885  throw;
2886  }
2887  }
2888 
2889  static void flat_decode(std::vector<unsigned char>& src, std::vector<unsigned char>& dest, PDFDictionary* decode_params)
2890  {
2891  z_stream stream;
2892  unsigned char buffer[4096];
2893  Predictior* predictor = NULL;
2894  try
2895  {
2896  dest.clear();
2897  if (decode_params)
2898  predictor = new Predictior(*decode_params);
2899  stream.zalloc = Z_NULL;
2900  stream.zfree = Z_NULL;
2901  stream.opaque = Z_NULL;
2902  if (inflateInit(&stream) != Z_OK)
2903  {
2904  if (predictor)
2905  delete predictor;
2906  predictor = NULL;
2907  throw Exception("inflateInit has failed");
2908  }
2909  int err;
2910  int written;
2911  stream.avail_in = src.size();
2912  stream.next_in = &src[0];
2913  do
2914  {
2915  stream.avail_out = 4096;
2916  stream.next_out = (Bytef*)buffer;
2917  switch ((err = inflate(&stream, Z_NO_FLUSH)))
2918  {
2919  case Z_NEED_DICT:
2920  case Z_DATA_ERROR:
2921  case Z_MEM_ERROR:
2922  {
2923  #warning TODO: Should I ignore this error and continue? One of the files I had was corrupted, but most data was readable.
2924  (void)inflateEnd(&stream);
2925  if (predictor)
2926  delete predictor;
2927  predictor = NULL;
2928  return;
2929  }
2930  }
2931  written = 4096 - stream.avail_out;
2932  if (predictor)
2933  {
2934  try
2935  {
2936  predictor->decode(buffer, written, dest);
2937  }
2938  catch (Exception& ex)
2939  {
2940  delete predictor;
2941  predictor = NULL;
2942  ex.appendError("Error while decoding data by predictor");
2943  throw;
2944  }
2945  }
2946  else
2947  {
2948  for (size_t i = 0; i < written; ++i)
2949  dest.push_back(buffer[i]);
2950  }
2951  }
2952  while (stream.avail_out == 0);
2953  if (predictor)
2954  delete predictor;
2955  predictor = NULL;
2956  }
2957  catch (std::bad_alloc& ba)
2958  {
2959  if (predictor)
2960  delete predictor;
2961  predictor = NULL;
2962  throw Exception("Bad alloc");
2963  }
2964  catch (Exception& ex)
2965  {
2966  if (predictor)
2967  delete predictor;
2968  predictor = NULL;
2969  ex.appendError("Error while decoding a stream using flat algorithm");
2970  throw;
2971  }
2972  }
2973 
2974  static void run_length_decode(std::vector<unsigned char>& src, std::vector<unsigned char>& dest)
2975  {
2976  int code_len = 0;
2977  dest.clear();
2978  size_t read_index = 0;
2979  size_t len = src.size();
2980  try
2981  {
2982  while (read_index != len)
2983  {
2984  char ch = src[read_index++];
2985  if (!code_len)
2986  code_len = ch;
2987  else if (code_len == 128)
2988  break;
2989  else if (code_len <= 127)
2990  {
2991  dest.push_back(ch);
2992  --code_len;
2993  }
2994  else if (code_len >= 129)
2995  {
2996  code_len = 257 - code_len;
2997  while (code_len--)
2998  dest.push_back(ch);
2999  }
3000  }
3001  }
3002  catch (Exception& ex)
3003  {
3004  ex.appendError("Error while decoding a stream using RLE algorithm");
3005  throw;
3006  }
3007  }
3008 
3009  void decode()
3010  {
3011  if (m_is_decoded)
3012  return;
3013  if (m_is_in_external_file)
3014  throw Exception("Cannot read stream data: data is inside external file, which is not supported yet");
3015 
3016  std::vector<PDFName*> filters;
3017  std::vector<PDFDictionary*> filter_options;
3018  try
3019  {
3020  PDFObject* filter_entry = (*m_dictionary)["Filter"];
3021  PDFObject* decode_params_entry = (*m_dictionary)["DecodeParms"];
3022  if (decode_params_entry)
3023  {
3024  if (decode_params_entry->isArray())
3025  {
3026  PDFArray* array_decode_params = decode_params_entry->getArray();
3027  for (size_t i = 0; i < array_decode_params->Size(); ++i)
3028  filter_options.push_back(array_decode_params->getObjAsDictionary(i));
3029  }
3030  else
3031  filter_options.push_back(decode_params_entry->getDictionary());
3032  }
3033  else
3034  filter_options.push_back(NULL);
3035 
3036  if (filter_entry->isArray())
3037  {
3038  PDFArray* array_filters = filter_entry->getArray();
3039  for (size_t i = 0; i < array_filters->Size(); ++i)
3040  filters.push_back(array_filters->getObjAsName(i));
3041  }
3042  else
3043  filters.push_back(filter_entry->getName());
3044  }
3045  catch (Exception& ex)
3046  {
3047  ex.appendError("Cannot decode stream: Cant load Filter and DecodeParms");
3048  throw;
3049  }
3050 
3051  if (filters.size() != filter_options.size())
3052  throw Exception("Cannot decode stream: number of filters does not match the number of decoding parameters");
3053 
3054  std::vector<unsigned char> stream_first_content(m_size);
3055  std::vector<unsigned char> stream_second_content;
3056  stream_second_content.reserve(m_size);
3057  size_t current_pos = m_reader->tell();
3058  if (!m_reader->seek(m_position, SEEK_SET))
3059  throw Exception("Cannot decode stream: cant seek to the position of the stream");
3060  if (!m_reader->read((char*)&stream_first_content[0], 1, m_size))
3061  throw Exception("Cannot decode stream: cant read encoded data");
3062  try
3063  {
3064  for (size_t i = 0; i < filters.size(); ++i)
3065  {
3066  switch (PDFReader::getCompressionCode((*filters[i])()))
3067  {
3068  case ascii_85:
3069  {
3070  if (i % 2 == 0)
3071  ascii_85_decode(stream_first_content, stream_second_content);
3072  else
3073  ascii_85_decode(stream_second_content, stream_first_content);
3074  break;
3075  }
3076  case lzw:
3077  {
3078  if (i % 2 == 0)
3079  lzw_decode(stream_first_content, stream_second_content, filter_options[i]);
3080  else
3081  lzw_decode(stream_second_content, stream_first_content, filter_options[i]);
3082  break;
3083  }
3084  case ascii_hex:
3085  {
3086  if (i % 2 == 0)
3087  ascii_hex_decode(stream_first_content, stream_second_content);
3088  else
3089  ascii_hex_decode(stream_second_content, stream_first_content);
3090  break;
3091  }
3092  case flat:
3093  {
3094  if (i % 2 == 0)
3095  flat_decode(stream_first_content, stream_second_content, filter_options[i]);
3096  else
3097  flat_decode(stream_second_content, stream_first_content, filter_options[i]);
3098  break;
3099  }
3100  case rle:
3101  {
3102  if (i % 2 == 0)
3103  run_length_decode(stream_first_content, stream_second_content);
3104  else
3105  run_length_decode(stream_second_content, stream_first_content);
3106  break;
3107  }
3108  default:
3109  {
3110  throw Exception("Cannot decode stream: Filter " + (*filters[i])() + " is not supported");
3111  }
3112  }
3113  }
3114  if (filters.size() % 2 == 1)
3115  {
3116  m_stream_data_buffer = new char[stream_second_content.size() + 2];
3117  m_stream_data_buffer[0] = '[';
3118  m_stream_data_buffer_len = stream_second_content.size() + 2;
3119  memcpy(m_stream_data_buffer + 1, &stream_second_content[0], stream_second_content.size());
3120  m_stream_data_buffer[m_stream_data_buffer_len - 1] = ']';
3121  m_stream_iterator.init(m_stream_data_buffer, m_stream_data_buffer_len);
3122  }
3123  else
3124  {
3125  m_stream_data_buffer = new char[stream_first_content.size() + 2];
3126  m_stream_data_buffer[0] = '[';
3127  m_stream_data_buffer_len = stream_first_content.size() + 2;
3128  memcpy(m_stream_data_buffer + 1, &stream_first_content[0], stream_first_content.size());
3129  m_stream_data_buffer[m_stream_data_buffer_len - 1] = ']';
3130  m_stream_iterator.init(m_stream_data_buffer, m_stream_data_buffer_len);
3131  }
3132  if (!m_reader->seek(current_pos, SEEK_SET))
3133  throw Exception("Cannot decode stream: Cannot go back to the previous location of the file, which is " + uint_to_string(current_pos));
3134  m_is_decoded = true;
3135  }
3136  catch (Exception& ex)
3137  {
3138  ex.appendError("Error while decoding stream");
3139  throw;
3140  }
3141  }
3142 
3143  void load()
3144  {
3145  try
3146  {
3147  if (m_stream_data_buffer)
3148  return;
3149  if (m_is_in_external_file)
3150  throw Exception("Cannot read stream data: data is inside external file, which is not supported yet");
3151  if (!m_is_decoded)
3152  decode();
3153  else
3154  {
3155  m_stream_data_buffer = new char[m_size + 2];
3156  m_stream_data_buffer[0] = '['; //make array
3157  m_stream_data_buffer_len = m_size + 2;
3158  size_t current_pos = m_reader->tell();
3159  if (!m_reader->seek(m_position, SEEK_SET))
3160  throw Exception("Cannot load stream data: cant seek to the beggining of the stream, position: " + uint_to_string(m_position));
3161  if (!m_reader->read(m_stream_data_buffer + 1, 1, m_size))
3162  throw Exception("Cannot read stream data, size to read: " + uint_to_string(m_size) + " from position " + uint_to_string(m_position));
3163  m_stream_data_buffer[m_stream_data_buffer_len - 1] = ']';
3164  if (!m_reader->seek(current_pos, SEEK_SET))
3165  throw Exception("Cannot go back to the previous position after loading stream data. Previous location: " + uint_to_string(current_pos));
3166  m_stream_iterator.init(m_stream_data_buffer, m_stream_data_buffer_len);
3167  }
3168  }
3169  catch (Exception& ex)
3170  {
3171  ex.appendError("Error while loading stream data at offset " + uint_to_string(m_position) + " and size " + uint_to_string(m_size));
3172  throw;
3173  }
3174  }
3175 
3176  PDFObject* createNewObjectFromStream()
3177  {
3178  m_stream_iterator.getNextElement();
3179  PDFObject* obj = NULL;
3180  try
3181  {
3182  switch (m_stream_iterator.getType())
3183  {
3184  case array:
3185  {
3186  obj = new PDFArray;
3187  m_stream_iterator.levelDown();
3188  while (m_stream_iterator.hasNext())
3189  ((PDFArray*)(obj))->m_objects.push_back(createNewObjectFromStream());
3190  m_stream_iterator.levelUp();
3191  return obj;
3192  }
3193  case boolean:
3194  {
3195  obj = new PDFBoolean;
3196  if (m_stream_iterator.getData()[0] == 't')
3197  ((PDFBoolean*)(obj))->m_value = true;
3198  else
3199  ((PDFBoolean*)(obj))->m_value = false;
3200  return obj;
3201  }
3202  case dictionary:
3203  {
3204  obj = new PDFDictionary;
3205  m_stream_iterator.levelDown();
3206  while (m_stream_iterator.hasNext())
3207  {
3208  m_stream_iterator.getNextElement();
3209  if (m_stream_iterator.getType() != name)
3210  throw Exception("Error while reading dictionary in stream: key is not a name");
3211  std::string name = std::string(m_stream_iterator.getData() + 1, m_stream_iterator.getDataLength() - 1);
3212  ((PDFDictionary*)obj)->m_objects[name] = createNewObjectFromStream();
3213  }
3214  m_stream_iterator.levelUp();
3215  return obj;
3216  }
3217  case int_numeric:
3218  {
3219  obj = new PDFNumericInteger;
3220  ((PDFNumericInteger*)obj)->m_value = strtol(m_stream_iterator.getData(), NULL, 10);
3221  return obj;
3222  }
3223  case float_numeric:
3224  {
3225  obj = new PDFNumericFloat;
3226  ((PDFNumericFloat*)obj)->m_value = strtod(m_stream_iterator.getData(), NULL);
3227  return obj;
3228  }
3229  case string:
3230  {
3231  obj = new PDFString;
3232  ((PDFString*)obj)->m_value = std::string(m_stream_iterator.getData() + 1, m_stream_iterator.getDataLength() - 2);
3233  if (m_stream_iterator.getData()[0] == '(')
3234  {
3235  ((PDFString*)obj)->m_is_hex = false;
3236  }
3237  else
3238  {
3239  ((PDFString*)obj)->m_is_hex = true;
3240  }
3241  return obj;
3242  }
3243  case name:
3244  {
3245  obj = new PDFName;
3246  ((PDFName*)obj)->m_value = std::string(m_stream_iterator.getData() + 1, m_stream_iterator.getDataLength() - 1);
3247  return obj;
3248  }
3249  case null:
3250  {
3251  obj = new PDFNull;
3252  return obj;
3253  }
3254  case reference_call:
3255  {
3256  obj = new PDFReferenceCall(*m_reader);
3257  char* ptr_begin = (char*)m_stream_iterator.getData();
3258  char* ptr_end = ptr_begin;
3259  ((PDFReferenceCall*)obj)->m_index = strtol(ptr_begin, &ptr_end, 10);
3260  ((PDFReferenceCall*)obj)->m_generation = strtol(ptr_end, NULL, 10);
3261  return obj;
3262  }
3263  default:
3264  {
3265  throw Exception("Cannot create object from stream: Unsupported type " + uint_to_string(m_stream_iterator.getType()) + ", value: " + m_stream_iterator.toPlainText());
3266  }
3267  }
3268  }
3269  catch (std::bad_alloc& ba)
3270  {
3271  if (obj)
3272  delete obj;
3273  obj = NULL;
3274  throw Exception("Bad alloc");
3275  }
3276  catch (Exception& ex)
3277  {
3278  if (obj)
3279  delete obj;
3280  obj = NULL;
3281  ex.appendError("Error while creating object from stream");
3282  throw;
3283  }
3284  }
3285  };
3286 
3287  class PDFNull : public PDFObject
3288  {
3289  public:
3290  PDFObjectTypes getType()
3291  {
3292  return null;
3293  }
3294 
3295  PDFNull* getNull()
3296  {
3297  return this;
3298  }
3299  };
3300 
3301  class PDFIndirectObject : public PDFObject
3302  {
3303  public:
3304  size_t m_generation;
3305  size_t m_index;
3306  PDFObject* m_object;
3307  PDFReader* m_reader;
3308  ReferenceInfo* m_owner;
3309 
3310  private:
3311  void loadObject()
3312  {
3313  if (!m_object)
3314  {
3315  try
3316  {
3317  m_object = m_reader->readIndirectObject(m_index);
3318  }
3319  catch (Exception& ex)
3320  {
3321  ex.appendError("Indirect object: Error while loading object with index " + uint_to_string(m_index)
3322  + " and generation number " + uint_to_string(m_generation));
3323  throw;
3324  }
3325  }
3326  }
3327 
3328  public:
3329  PDFIndirectObject(PDFReader& reader, ReferenceInfo* owner)
3330  {
3331  m_generation = 0;
3332  m_index = 0;
3333  m_object = NULL;
3334  m_reader = &reader;
3335  m_owner = owner;
3336  }
3337 
3338  ~PDFIndirectObject()
3339  {
3340  if (m_object)
3341  delete m_object;
3342  }
3343 
3344  PDFObjectTypes getType()
3345  {
3346  if (!m_object)
3347  {
3348  loadObject();
3349  }
3350  return m_object->getType();
3351  }
3352 
3353  PDFString* getString()
3354  {
3355  if (!m_object)
3356  {
3357  loadObject();
3358  }
3359  return m_object->getString();
3360  }
3361 
3362  PDFDictionary* getDictionary()
3363  {
3364  if (!m_object)
3365  {
3366  loadObject();
3367  }
3368  return m_object->getDictionary();
3369  }
3370 
3371  PDFBoolean* getBoolean()
3372  {
3373  if (!m_object)
3374  {
3375  loadObject();
3376  }
3377  return m_object->getBoolean();
3378  }
3379 
3380  PDFNumericFloat* getNumericFloat()
3381  {
3382  if (!m_object)
3383  {
3384  loadObject();
3385  }
3386  return m_object->getNumericFloat();
3387  }
3388 
3389  PDFNumericInteger* getNumericInteger()
3390  {
3391  if (!m_object)
3392  {
3393  loadObject();
3394  }
3395  return m_object->getNumericInteger();
3396  }
3397 
3398  PDFArray* getArray()
3399  {
3400  if (!m_object)
3401  {
3402  loadObject();
3403  }
3404  return m_object->getArray();
3405  }
3406 
3407  PDFName* getName()
3408  {
3409  if (!m_object)
3410  {
3411  loadObject();
3412  }
3413  return m_object->getName();
3414  }
3415 
3416  PDFNull* getNull()
3417  {
3418  if (!m_object)
3419  {
3420  loadObject();
3421  }
3422  return m_object->getNull();
3423  }
3424 
3425  PDFStream* getStream()
3426  {
3427  if (!m_object)
3428  {
3429  loadObject();
3430  }
3431  return m_object->getStream();
3432  }
3433 
3434  PDFIndirectObject* getIndirectObject()
3435  {
3436  return this;
3437  }
3438 
3439  bool isIndirectObject()
3440  {
3441  return true;
3442  }
3443  };
3444 
3445  class PDFReferenceCall : public PDFObject
3446  {
3447  //例如:xxx 0 R
3448  public:
3449  size_t m_index; //对象号:xxx
3450  size_t m_generation; //产生号:一般为0
3451  PDFObject* m_object;
3452  PDFReader* m_reader;
3453 
3454  private:
3455  void loadObject()
3456  {
3457  if (!m_object)
3458  {
3459  try
3460  {
3461  m_object = m_reader->readIndirectObject(m_index);
3462  }
3463  catch (Exception& ex)
3464  {
3465  ex.appendError("Call to reference: Error while loading object with index " + uint_to_string(m_index)
3466  + " and generation number " + uint_to_string(m_generation));
3467  throw;
3468  }
3469  }
3470  }
3471 
3472  public:
3473  PDFReferenceCall(PDFReader& reader)
3474  {
3475  m_index = 0;
3476  m_generation = 0;
3477  m_object = NULL;
3478  m_reader = &reader;
3479  }
3480 
3481  PDFObjectTypes getType()
3482  {
3483  if (!m_object)
3484  {
3485  loadObject();
3486  }
3487  return m_object->getType();
3488  }
3489 
3490  PDFString* getString()
3491  {
3492  if (!m_object)
3493  {
3494  loadObject();
3495  }
3496  return m_object->getString();
3497  }
3498 
3499  PDFDictionary* getDictionary()
3500  {
3501  if (!m_object)
3502  {
3503  loadObject();
3504  }
3505  return m_object->getDictionary();
3506  }
3507 
3508  PDFBoolean* getBoolean()
3509  {
3510  if (!m_object)
3511  {
3512  loadObject();
3513  }
3514  return m_object->getBoolean();
3515  }
3516 
3517  PDFNumericFloat* getNumericFloat()
3518  {
3519  if (!m_object)
3520  {
3521  loadObject();
3522  }
3523  return m_object->getNumericFloat();
3524  }
3525 
3526  PDFNumericInteger* getNumericInteger()
3527  {
3528  if (!m_object)
3529  {
3530  loadObject();
3531  }
3532  return m_object->getNumericInteger();
3533  }
3534 
3535  PDFArray* getArray()
3536  {
3537  if (!m_object)
3538  {
3539  loadObject();
3540  }
3541  return m_object->getArray();
3542  }

3545  {
3546  if (!m_object)
3547  {
3548  loadObject();
3549  }
3550  return m_object->getName();
3551  }

3556  {
3557  loadObject();
3558  }
3559  return m_object->getNull();
3560  }
3561 
3562  PDFStream* getStream()
3563  {
3564  if (!m_object)
3565  {
3566  loadObject();
3567  }
3568  return m_object->getStream();
3569  }
3570 
3571  PDFReferenceCall* getReferenceCall()
3572  {
3573  return this;
3574  }
3575

3577  {
